timeline.bodyText: Just remove the throws if no extra javadoc.
timeline.author: Apache9
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -82,8 +82,7 @@
    * @param nonceKey A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
    * @param latch A latch to block on for precondition validation
    * @return procedure id
-   * @throws IOException Throws {@link ClusterSchemaException} and {@link InterruptedIOException}
-   *    as well as {@link IOException}
+   * @throws IOException

replies.bodyText: I think removal of @throws might cause javadoc warnings, providing some description here would be better. Based on impl, it seems we might not be able to get rid of throws from method signature.
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: OK, i will add some description about the exception, thanks
replies.author: yuqi1129
